sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_392c8baadb7e630054d8ff621f9619e9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>BDSTEPUtil</name><script><![CDATA[function BDSTEPUtil($http){
	this.getFieldName = function(){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				method : "GET",
				url : "/api/x_naci_bd_step/fellowship/getFieldName",
						headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});
	};
	this.getSiteName = function(){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				method : "GET",
				url : "/api/x_naci_bd_step/fellowship/getSiteName",
				headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}
			}).then(resolve, reject);	
		});	
	};
	this.submitApplication = function(data){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				method: "POST",
				url : "/api/x_naci_bd_step/fellowship/submitApplication",
				headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				data: {data: data}
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});
	};
	this.getApplicationData = function(id){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			$http({
				method: "GET",
				url : "/api/x_naci_bd_step/fellowship/getApplicationData",
				headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				params: {id: id}
			}).then(resolve, reject);
		});		
	}
	this.readFile = function(file, callback){
		var fileReader = new FileReader();
		fileReader.onload = function() {
			var result = fileReader.result;
			callback(result);
		}
		fileReader.readAsDataURL(file); //file must be base64
	}
	this.uploadAttachment = function(id, content, name){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
		$http({
				method: "post",
				url : "/api/x_naci_bd_step/fellowship/uploadAttachment",
				headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'},
				data: {sys_id: id, fileName: name, content: content}
			}).then(resolve, reject);			
		});
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-07 20:49:53</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>392c8baadb7e630054d8ff621f9619e9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>BDSTEPUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BD STEP" source="x_naci_bd_step">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BD STEP">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_392c8baadb7e630054d8ff621f9619e9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 16:52:42</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_bf93a01bdb76230054d8ff621f9619a4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getApplicationData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var id = request.queryParams.id.toString();
    var result = {};
	var recItem = new GlideRecord('x_naci_bd_step_db_step');
		recItem.addQuery('sys_id', id);
	recItem.query();
	recItem.next();
	result.phd = recItem.phd.toString();
	result.phd_graduate_date = recItem.phd_graduate_date.toString();
	result.description_for_research = recItem.description_for_research.toString();
	result.citizen = recItem.citizen.toString();
	result.permanent_resident = recItem.permanent_resident.toString();
	result.name = recItem.name.toString();
	result.email = recItem.email.toString();
	result.phone = recItem.phone.toString();
	result.address = recItem.address.toString();
	result.institution = recItem.affiliated_institution.toString();
	result.field = recItem.field_study.toString();
	result.experience = recItem.experience.toString();
	result.first_choice = recItem.site_choice_1.toString();
	result.second_choice = recItem.site_choice_2.toString();
	result.third_choice = recItem.site_choice_3.toString();
	
	var attach = [];
	var attachment =  new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
		attachment.addQuery('table_sys_id', id);
		attachment.query();
		while(attachment.next()){
		   var item = {};
		   item.attch_id = attachment.sys_id.toString();	
		   item.file_name =	attachment.file_name.toString();	
           attach.push(item);
        }
	if(attach.length == 0){
		result.attch_id1 = '';
		result.attch_name1 = '';
		result.attch_id2 = '';
		result.attch_name2 = ''; 
		result.attch_id3 = '';
		result.attch_name3 = '';
	}else{
		result.attch_id1 = attach[0].attch_id.toString();
		result.attch_name1 = attach[0].file_name.toString();
		result.attch_id2 = attach[1].attch_id.toString();
		result.attch_name2 = attach[1].file_name.toString();	
		result.attch_id3 = attach[2].attch_id.toString();
		result.attch_name3 = attach[2].file_name.toString();	
	}
	
    return result;

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_2ec7cb66db7e630054d8ff621f9619aa
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getSiteName</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var result = [];
	var siteItem = new GlideRecord('x_naci_bd_step_site_name');
		siteItem.orderBy('name');
	siteItem.query();
	while(siteItem.next()){
		var item = {};
		item.value = siteItem.name.toString();
		item.label = siteItem.name.toString();
		result.push(item);
	}
    
	return result;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_bd_step/fellowship/getSiteName</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getSiteName</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-07 20:26:47</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2ec7cb66db7e630054d8ff621f9619aa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getSiteName</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BD STEP" source="x_naci_bd_step">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BD STEP">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_2ec7cb66db7e630054d8ff621f9619aa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 16:50:20</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Fellowship">b750d6e6dbba630054d8ff621f961926</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_css_a1b9e69ddb36af40b86770c08c9619f2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_css"><sp_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>.touch_scroll{
  overflow:auto !important;
}
input:-webkit-autofill, textarea:-webkit-autofill {
  background-color: white !important;
}
#bd-step-nav{
  position:relative;
  width:100%;
  height:50px;
  background-color:#4A5F93;
}
#bd-step-nav .banner {
  color:white;
  font-weight:bold;
  font-size:1.8rem;
  height:50px;
  line-height:50px;
}
#footer .alert-info {
    color: #31708f;
    background-color: #d9edf7;
    border-color: #bce8f1;
    text-align: center;
}
#footer .alert {
    padding: 15px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border: 1px solid transparent;
    border-radius: 4px;
}
#footer .footer-box{
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0 0 0 0;
    padding: 30px 0 30px 0;
    border-top: 3px #4A5F93 solid;
}
.footer-box ul.footer-nav {
    display: block;
    width: auto;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 100%;
    font-weight: 400;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0 0 0 0;
}
.footer-box .footer-nav li {
    color: #135B5D;
    text-align: center;
    display: inline;
    margin: 0 0 0 0;
    padding: 2px 0;
    background: url(bg_footer_nav.png) center right no-repeat;
}
.footer-box .footer-nav a {
    margin: 0 12px 0 6px;
    padding: 2px 4px;
    border-bottom: 1px #fff solid;
    transition: all 200ms ease-out;
}
.footer-box .footer-nav a:hover {
    color: #66665D;
    border-bottom: 1px #91908A solid;
}
.footer-box .footer-nav li.no-right {
    background: none;
}
.footer-box ul.footer-nav.external-links {
    font-size: 90%;
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    background: url(bg_footer_rule.png) center bottom no-repeat;
}
#footer p {
    color: #135B5D;
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%;
}
.top-menu{
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0px;
  display:flex;
}
.menu-item{
  width:200px;
  height: 35px;
  line-height: 35px;
  text-align: center;
  border-bottom: 1px solid gray;
}
.menu-item.active{
  border-top: 1px solid gray;
  border-left: 1px solid gray;
  border-right: 1px solid gray;
  border-radius: 5px 5px 0px 0px;
  border-bottom: 0px;
}
.menu-item-last{
  border-bottom: 1px solid gray;
  width: calc(100% - 600px);
}
.menu-item-last1{
  border-bottom: 1px solid gray;
  width: calc(100% - 400px);
}
#bd-step-main{
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  margin-top: 10px;
  padding:0px;
}
.main-content{
  border: 1px solid gray;
  border-top: 0px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;
  min-height: 600px; 
}
.sp-page-root{
  overflow:auto !important;
}
div.page, section.page {
  overflow: visible;
  height:auto;
}
.panel-bgColor{
	background-color: #E1F9F7;
}
.form-margin-right{
   margin-right:20px;
}
.form-margin-left{
  margin-left:10px;
}</css><name>BD STEP css</name><sys_class_name>sp_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-03 21:05:15</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a1b9e69ddb36af40b86770c08c9619f2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>BD STEP css</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BD STEP" source="x_naci_bd_step">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BD STEP">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_css_a1b9e69ddb36af40b86770c08c9619f2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-02-26 16:40:49</sys_updated_on></sp_css></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_061ccf72db7aa30054d8ff621f961951
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>submitApplication</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var retObj = {};
	var data = request.body.data.data;
	var bdstepItem = new GlideRecord('x_naci_bd_step_db_step');
	bdstepItem.initialize();
	bdstepItem.name = data.name.toString();
	bdstepItem.email = data.email;
	bdstepItem.phone = data.phone;
	bdstepItem.address = data.mailingAddress;
	bdstepItem.affiliated_institution = data.institution;
	bdstepItem.field_study = data.field;
	if(data.field == 'Other'){
		bdstepItem.field_study = data.other;
	}
	bdstepItem.experience = data.experience;
	bdstepItem.site_choice_1 = data.firstChoice;
	bdstepItem.site_choice_2 = data.secondChoice;
	bdstepItem.site_choice_3 = data.thirdChoice;
	bdstepItem.phd = data.phd;
	bdstepItem.citizen = data.citizen;
    bdstepItem.permanent_resident = data.greencard;
	if(data.phd == 'no'){
		bdstepItem.description_for_research = data.description.toString();
		bdstepItem.phd_graduate_date = data.graduateDateString.toString();
	}
	var id = bdstepItem.insert();
	retObj.id = id;
	return retObj;

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getFieldName</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var result = [];
	var fieldItem = new GlideRecord('x_naci_bd_step_field_name');
		fieldItem.orderBy('order');
	fieldItem.query();
	while(fieldItem.next()){
		var item = {};
		item.value = fieldItem.field_name.toString();
		item.label = fieldItem.field_name.toString();
		result.push(item);
	}
   
	return result;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_bd_step/fellowship/getFieldName</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getFieldName</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-07 20:27:21</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>71e7cb26db7e630054d8ff621f9619ec</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getFieldName</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BD STEP" source="x_naci_bd_step">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BD STEP">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_71e7cb26db7e630054d8ff621f9619ec</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 16:50:13</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Fellowship">b750d6e6dbba630054d8ff621f961926</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: customPlease provide your expected PhD graduation date and a short description of the time you plan to spend on BD-STEP research!"); }else if(type == 'citizen'){ $('#info').html("Applicants must be US citizen to be hired within a VA facility. Non-citizens are also encouraged to apply, but are not eligible for VA stipend support!"); }else { $('#info').html("You are not qualified to register the Big Data Scientist Training Enhancement Program !"); } $('#infoModal').modal('show'); }*/ $scope.submitForm = function(){ //alert($scope.form.graduateDate.toLocaleDateString()); $scope.submitted = true; $scope.form.graduateDateString = $scope.form.graduateDate.toLocaleDateString(); if(!isValid()){ $scope.showError = true; }else{ $scope.showError = false; normalizeData(); var params = JSON.stringify($scope.form); BDSTEPUtil.submitApplication($scope.form).then(function(res){ var id = res.data.result.id.toString(); uploadFile(id); }, function(error){ console.log(error); alert("ERROR"); }); } } function normalizeData() { console.log($scope.form); for (var key in $scope.form) { var value = $scope.form[key]; if (typeof value == 'string') $scope.form[key] = value.trim(); } } function uploadFile(id){ var file1 = c.data.file1; var file2 = c.data.file2; var file3 = c.data.file3; if(!(file1 === undefined)){ BDSTEPUtil.readFile(file1, handleContents1); } if(!(file2 === undefined)){ BDSTEPUtil.readFile(file2, handleContents2); } if(!(file3 === undefined)){ BDSTEPUtil.readFile(file3, handleContents3); } showMessage(); //upload file1 function handleContents1(contents) { var fileName = file1.name; BDSTEPUtil.uploadAttachment(id, contents, fileName).then(function(res){ c.data.file1 = null; $scope.$apply(); }, function (error){ alert("ERROR!"); console.log(error); }); } //upload file2 function handleContents2(contents) { var fileName = file2.name; BDSTEPUtil.uploadAttachment(id, contents, fileName).then(function(res){ c.data.file2 = null; $scope.$apply(); }, function (error){ alert("ERROR!"); console.log(error); }); } //upload file3 function handleContents3(contents) { var fileName = file3.name; BDSTEPUtil.uploadAttachment(id, contents, fileName).then(function(res){ c.data.file3 = null; $scope.$apply(); }, function (error){ alert("ERROR!"); console.log(error); }); } } function showMessage(){ $('#info').html("Your application has been submitted successfully."); $('#infoModal').modal('show'); $scope.form.phd = ''; $scope.form.citizen = ''; $scope.form.greencard = ''; $scope.form.name = ''; $scope.form.email = ''; $scope.form.phone = ''; $scope.form.mailingAddress = ''; $scope.form.institution = ''; $scope.form.field = ''; $scope.form.experience = ''; $scope.form.firstChoice = ''; $scope.form.secondChoice = ''; $scope.form.thirdChoice = ''; $scope.form.other = ''; $scope.submitted = false; $scope.showError = false; $scope.form.graduateDateString = ''; $scope.form.graduateDate = new Date(); $scope.form.description = ''; $('#email').css('background-color', ''); c.data.file1 = ''; c.data.file2 = ''; c.data.file3 = ''; } //return true shows there is an error function isValid(){ var valid = Boolean($scope.form.phd && $scope.form.name && $scope.form.phone && $scope.form.mailingAddress && $scope.form.citizen && $scope.form.institution && $scope.form.email && $scope.validateEmail($scope.form.email) && $scope.form.field && $scope.form.experience && $scope.form.firstChoice && c.data.file1 && c.data.file2 && c.data.file3); if(!valid){ $('#err').html("Please fill in required fields."); } if (valid && $scope.form.phd == 'no'){ valid = Boolean($scope.form.description); } return valid; } $scope.validateEmail = function(email){ if (/^\w+([\.-]?\w+)*@\w+([\.-]?\w+)*(\.\w{2,3})+$/.test(email)){ return (true); } return (false); } function loadFieldName(){ BDSTEPUtil.getFieldName().then(function(res){ c.data.fields = res.data.result; }, function(error){ alert('ERROR!'); console.log(error); }); } function loadSiteName(){ BDSTEPUtil.getSiteName().then(function(res){ c.data.sites = res.data.result; }, function(error){ alert("ERROR!"); console.log(error); }); } $('.input-file').click(function() { this.value = ''; }) $('.input-file').change(function() { var id = this.id; var file = this.files ? this.files[0] : null; c.data[id] = file; $scope.$apply(); }); $scope.limitWordCount = function(name, limit) { var text = $scope.form[name] || ''; var words = text.split(' '); if (words.length > limit) { $scope.form[name] = words.slice(0, limit).join(' '); } } } ]]>c.file-section{ width:100%; } .input-file-container { display:inline-block; position: relative; } .input-file-trigger { display: block; padding: 10px 25px; background:#0280a9; color: #fff; } .input-file-label { color: #716f6f; font-weight: normal; margin-left: 10px; } .input-file { position: absolute; display：block; top: 0; left: 0; height:40px; opacity: 0; cursor:pointer; text-indent: -999px; } .file-return { border: 1px solid #ccc; border-top-left-radius: 4px; border-bottom-left-radius: 4px; width: calc(100% - 105px); height: 40px; line-height:40px; display: inline-block; font-style: italic; font-size: .9em; font-weight: bold; float:left; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; } .bg-yellow { background-color: yellow; } .mid-font-size { font-size: small; } .resize-vertical { resize: vertical; } .margin-left { margin-left: 10px; } .error { color: red; }sp_instancefalsebd_step_registrationfalseBD STEP Registrationtruefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2019-01-03 22:00:32false28f63e99db76af40b86770c08c961979794BD STEP Registration12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941false12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941sp_widget_28f63e99db76af40b86770c08c961979zhoujim@nih.gov2019-02-26 14:46:04

sys_update_xml.name: sp_rel_widget_clone_d5922b89dbc3a700b86770c08c9619cf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="BD Step External Login Widget">59922b89dbc3a700b86770c08c9619cc</child><cloned>2019-01-15 16:48:24</cloned><last_validated>2019-01-15 16:48:24</last_validated><parent display_value="Login">6506d341cb33020000f8d856634c9cdc</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>standard</category><client_script><![CDATA[function loginCtrl($scope, $http, $window, $location, glideUserSession, glideSystemProperties, spUtil) {

	var c = this;
	c.remember_me = c.data.forgetMeDefault;

	if (!c.data.is_logged_in && c.data.multisso_enabled && c.data.default_idp) {
		c.server.get({
			action: "set_sso_destination",
			pageURI: c.data.pageURI
		}).then(function() {
			$window.location = "/login_with_sso.do?glide_sso_id=" + c.data.default_idp;
		});
	}

	c.login = function(username, password) {
		var url = spUtil.getURL({sysparm_type: 'view_form.login'});
		
		// If the page isn't public, then the ID in the
		// URL won't match the rendered page ID
		var pageId = $location.search().id || $scope.page.id;
		var isLoginPage = $scope.portal.login_page_dv == pageId;

		return $http({
			method: 'post',
			url: url,
			data: $.param({
				'sysparm_type': 'login',
				'ni.nolog.user_password': true,
				'remember_me': !!c.remember_me ? true : false,
				'user_name': username,
				'user_password': password,
				'get_redirect_url': true,
				'sysparm_goto_url': isLoginPage ? null : $location.url(),
				'mfa_redirect_url': c.data.pageURI
			}),
			headers: {
				'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'
			}
		}).then(function(response) {
			if (!response.data) {
				c.message = $scope.data.errorMsg;
				return;
			}

			if (response.data.status == 'success') {
				if (c.data.multiFactorAuthEnabled) {
					c.server.get({
						action: "multi_factor_auth_setup",
						directTo: response.data.redirect_url
					}).then(handleLoginSuccess.bind(response));
				} else {
					handleLoginSuccess.call(response);
				}
			} else if (response.data.status == 'mfa_code_required') {
					$window.location = '/validate_multifactor_auth_code.do';
			} else {
				// wrong username or password
				c.message = response.data.message;
				c.password = "";
				c.username = "";
				angular.element("#username").focus();
			}

		}, function errorCallback(response) {
			c.message = $scope.data.errorMsg;
		});
	};

	c.externalLogin = function() {
		c.server.get({
			action: "set_sso_destination",
			pageURI: c.data.pageURI
		}).then(function() {
			glideSystemProperties.set("glide.authenticate.multisso.enabled", true);

			glideUserSession.getSsoRedirectUrlForUsername(c.username)
				.then(function(url) {
					$window.location = url;
				}, function(err) {
					spUtil.addErrorMessage($scope.data.errorMsg2);
				});
		});
	}

	function handleLoginSuccess() {
		c.success = this.data.message;
		$window.location = this.data.redirect_url;
	}

	c.setExternalLogin = function(newVal) {
		c.externalLoginMode = newVal;
	}
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>.set-login-type-link {
  margin-top: 10px;
  display: block;
}

.form-control,
label[for="username"],
label[for="password"] {
	color: black;
}

.btn {
	font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 2.0rem;
  background-color: #176AAD;
  border-color: #0B4E85;
}
</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>widget-login</id><internal>false</internal><link/><name>Login</name><option_schema>[{"name":"show_panel","section":"Presentation","default_value":"true","label":"Show Panel","type":"boolean"}]</option_schema><public>true</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {
	options.show_panel = options.show_panel == "true" || options.show_panel == true;
	
	if (input && input.action === "multi_factor_auth_setup") {
		if (gs.getSession().getProperty("setup_multifactor_authn")) {
			gs.getSession().putProperty("nav_to", input.directTo);
			gs.getSession().putProperty("starting_page", input.directTo);
			gs.getSession().putProperty("is_direct_redirect", "true");
		}
		return;
	}
	
	// We don't want to set a starting page until we've begun the login process.
	if (input && input.action === "set_sso_destination") {
		var gs_nav_to = gs.getSession().getProperty("nav_to");
		gs.getSession().putProperty("nav_to", null);
		if (!gs.getSession().getProperty("starting_page"))
			gs.getSession().putProperty("starting_page", gs_nav_to);

		return;
	}

	data.errorMsg = gs.getMessage("There was an error processing your request");
	data.errorMsg2 = gs.getMessage("An error has occurred - please contact your system administrator");
	data.passwordMsg = gs.getMessage("Password");
	data.usernameMsg = gs.getMessage("User name");
	data.forgetMe = GlideProperties.getBoolean("glide.ui.forgetme");
	data.forgetMeDefault = GlideProperties.getBoolean('glide.ui.remember.me.default', true);
	data.is_logged_in = gs.getSession().isLoggedIn();
	var bypass_sso = options.bypass_sso == "true";
	data.multisso_enabled = !bypass_sso && GlideProperties.getBoolean("glide.authenticate.multisso.enabled");			
	data.default_idp = GlideProperties.get("glide.authenticate.sso.redirect.idp");
	data.pageURI = new GlideSPUtil().getPageUri();
	data.multiFactorAuthEnabled = GlideProperties.getBoolean('glide.authenticate.multifactor', false);
})();]]></script><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-11-16 21:42:24</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6506d341cb33020000f8d856634c9cdc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>317</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Login</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">5b9039d8db323200bedc72131f961977</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_6506d341cb33020000f8d856634c9cdc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-10-04 19:01:11</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div ng-if="!data.is_logged_in">
  <form ng-if="!c.externalLoginMode" class="form-signin" ng-submit="c.login(c.username, c.password)" method="post">
		<div ng-class="{'panel panel-default': c.options.show_panel}">
			<div ng-if="c.options.show_panel" class="panel-heading">	      
				<h3 class="panel-title">${Login}</h3>
			</div>

			<div ng-class="{'panel-body': c.options.show_panel}">

				<div class="list-group list-group-sm">
					<div class="list-group-item">
            <label for="username" class="sr-only">{{::data.usernameMsg}}</label>
            <input id="username" name="username" autocapitalize="off" ng-keypress="c.message = ''" ng-click="c.message = ''" class="form-control no-border" type="text" placeholder='{{::data.usernameMsg}}' autofocus="true" ng-model="c.username"/>
					</div>
					<div class="list-group-item">
            <label for="password" class="sr-only">{{::data.passwordMsg}}</label>
            <input id="password" name="password" ng-keypress="c.message = ''" ng-click="c.message = ''" class="form-control no-border" type="password" placeholder='{{::data.passwordMsg}}' ng-model="c.password"/>
					</div>
				</div>

				<div ng-if="c.message" class="alert alert-danger" role="alert">{{c.message}}</div>
				<div ng-if="c.success" class="alert alert-success" role="alert">{{c.success}}</div>

				<div ng-if="!c.data.forgetMe" class="checkbox">
          <label>
            <input name="c.remember_me" ng-model="c.remember_me" checked="checked" id="remember_me" type="checkbox" class="checkbox" value="true"/> ${Remember me}
					</label>
				</div>

        <button name="login" type="submit" class="btn btn-lg btn-primary btn-block">
          ${Login}
        </button>

        <a ng-if="data.multisso_enabled"
           class="set-login-type-link"
           href="javascript:void(0)"
           ng-click="c.setExternalLogin(true)">${Use external login}</a>
			</div>
		</div>
	</form>
	<form ng-if="c.externalLoginMode" class="form-signin" ng-submit="c.externalLogin()" method="post">
		<div ng-class="{'panel panel-default': c.options.show_panel}">
			<div ng-if="c.options.show_panel" class="panel-heading">
				<h3 class="panel-title">${External Login}</h3>
			</div>

			<div ng-class="{'panel-body': c.options.show_panel}">
				<div class="list-group list-group-sm">
					<div class="list-group-item">
            <label for="username" class="sr-only">${User ID}</label>
            <input id="username" name="username" ng-click="message = ''" class="form-control no-border" type="text" placeholder='${User ID}' autofocus="true" ng-model="c.username"/>
					</div>
				</div>

        <button name="login" type="submit" class="btn btn-lg btn-primary btn-block">
          ${Submit}
        </button>

        <a href="javascript:void(0)"
           class="set-login-type-link"
           ng-click="c.setExternalLogin(false)">${Use internal login}</a>
			</div>
		</div>
	</form>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-15 16:48:24</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d5922b89dbc3a700b86770c08c9619cf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>59922b89dbc3a700b86770c08c9619cc</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BD STEP" source="x_naci_bd_step">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BD STEP">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_d5922b89dbc3a700b86770c08c9619cf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-15 16:48:24</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_page"><sp_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>custom</category><css>#bd-step-nav{
  position:relative;
  width:100%;
  height:50px;
  background-color:#4A5F93;
}
#bd-step-nav .banner {
  color:white;
  font-weight:bold;
  font-size:1.8rem;
  height:50px;
  line-height:50px;
}
#footer .alert-info {
    color: #31708f;
    background-color: #d9edf7;
    border-color: #bce8f1;
    text-align: center;
}
#footer .alert {
    padding: 15px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border: 1px solid transparent;
    border-radius: 4px;
}
#footer .footer-box{
    width: 100%;
    margin: 0 0 0 0;
    padding: 30px 0 30px 0;
    border-top: 3px #4A5F93 solid;
}
.footer-box ul.footer-nav {
    display: block;
    width: auto;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 100%;
    font-weight: 400;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0 0 0 0;
}
.footer-box .footer-nav li {
    color: #135B5D;
    text-align: center;
    display: inline;
    margin: 0 0 0 0;
    padding: 2px 0;
    background: url(bg_footer_nav.png) center right no-repeat;
}
.footer-box .footer-nav a {
    margin: 0 12px 0 6px;
    padding: 2px 4px;
    border-bottom: 1px #fff solid;
    transition: all 200ms ease-out;
}
.footer-box .footer-nav a:hover {
    color: #66665D;
    border-bottom: 1px #91908A solid;
}
.footer-box .footer-nav li.no-right {
    background: none;
}
.footer-box ul.footer-nav.external-links {
    font-size: 90%;
    margin-top: 20px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    background: url(bg_footer_rule.png) center bottom no-repeat;
}
#footer p {
    color: #135B5D;
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%;
}
.top-menu{
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0px;
  display:flex;
}
.menu-item{
  width:200px;
  height: 35px;
  line-height: 35px;
  text-align: center;
  border-bottom: 1px solid gray;
}
.menu-item.active{
  border-top: 1px solid gray;
  border-left: 1px solid gray;
  border-right: 1px solid gray;
  border-radius: 5px 5px 0px 0px;
  border-bottom: 0px;
}
.menu-item-last{
  border-bottom: 1px solid gray;
  width: calc(100% - 600px);
}
#bd-step-main{
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  margin-top: 10px;
  padding:0px;
}
.main-content{
  border: 1px solid gray;
  border-top: 0px;
  border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;
  border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;
  min-height: 600px; 
}
.sp-page-root{
  overflow:auto !important;
}
div.page, section.page {
  overflow: visible;
  height:auto;
}
.panel-bgColor{
	background-color: #E1F9F7;
}
.form-margin-right{
   margin-right:20px;
}
.form-margin-left{
  margin-left:10px;
}</css><draft>false</draft><dynamic_title_structure/><id>bd_detail_page</id><internal>false</internal><public>false</public><roles/><short_description/><sys_class_name>sp_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-09 15:05:01</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6061d81bdb36230054d8ff621f96191a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>bd_detail_page</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BD STEP" source="x_naci_bd_step">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BD STEP">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_page_6061d81bdb36230054d8ff621f96191a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 20:34:15</sys_updated_on><title>BD detail Page</title></sp_page></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_6f050517dbf6230054d8ff621f9619ef
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>POST</http_method><name>uploadAttachment</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var data = request.body.data;
	var fileName = data.fileName;
	var content = data.content;
	var sys_id = data.sys_id;
	var fileType = '';
	
	var parts = content.split(',');
	var mimeType = parts[0].replace(/(^data:)|(;base64$)/g, '');
	
	var attachement = new GlideSysAttachment();
	var gr = new GlideRecord("x_naci_bd_step_db_step");
	var record = gr.get(sys_id);
	var attachment_sys_id = attachement.writeBase64(gr, fileName, mimeType, parts[1]);
	return attachment_sys_id;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_naci_bd_step/fellowship/uploadAttachment</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/uploadAttachment</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-01-09 18:52:29</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6f050517dbf6230054d8ff621f9619ef</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>uploadAttachment</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BD STEP" source="x_naci_bd_step">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BD STEP">12dec3d8dbba2f4054d8ff621f961941</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_6f050517dbf6230054d8ff621f9619ef</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-10 16:50:40</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Fellowship">b750d6e6dbba630054d8ff621f961926</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
